Scene:
Hyoe's Mansion
(Iihara Hyōe yakata / 飯原館)

Play: The Pine Tree on the River Bank (岸姫松轡鑑)

Production: September 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Rodayū V (豊竹呂大夫 (五))

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Katsunosuke (鶴澤勝之輔)

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
